channel.description: Recent content in enterprise on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Digital Governance and the Promise of Blockchains in Supporting Democratic Systems
item.description: There’s a quiet revolution taking place in Asia’s boardrooms and policy circles. Blockchain technology represents a leap in both corporate governance and the emerging concept of digital governance. It changes how democratic systems build consensus and put power back into the hands of stakeholders. According to The Economist Intelligence Unit’s (EIU) 2021 Democracy Index survey, which ranks 167 countries across various factors, including their electoral processes, civil liberties, and levels of political participation, global freedoms hit a record low last year.

item.title: Nomadic Labs partners with PwC in France to analyze the Tezos blockchain's environmental footprint
item.description: In a landmark report prepared by PricewaterhouseCoopers Advisory SAS in partnership with Nomadic Labs, a French subsidiary of Tezos Foundation, users and bakers across the Tezos blockchain have gained crucial insights into the energy efficiency of the blockchain and its implications for usage at scale. To ensure the report’s findings were accurate, Nomadic Labs hired Hélène Lelièvre (Enviroconseil), an LCA professional with a wealth of experience in eco-design and carbon footprint analysis, to conduct an independent critical review.
